ValidationRule.description: Nama pelapor field is not filled in or blank and case status moved to Closed/Waiting Document/Escalated from New
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration), ISBLANK(SCC_Nama_Pelapor__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "New"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Waiting Document"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Escalated"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") ) )&& Case_Cutoff__c == TRUE && NOT( $Profile.Name = 'Salesforce API Only System Integrations')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Silahkan mengisi Nama Pelapor jika tidak ada Nama Nasabah
